89dd1493-547d-49b4-89c4-18cb4787de5a.description: Begin a major campaign to shift diets to almost entirely vegan.
89dd1493-547d-49b4-89c4-18cb4787de5a.name: Global Veganism
89dd1493-547d-49b4-89c4-18cb4787de5a.requirements: Can be implemented at any time, but varying hits to contentedness
89dd1493-547d-49b4-89c4-18cb4787de5a.effects: Lower risks of pandemics, frees up a lot of land, ...

3c30eed1-ebbb-4c90-8030-003bf2a7be1e.name: Improved Ecological Monitoring
3c30eed1-ebbb-4c90-8030-003bf2a7be1e.description: Upgrade and expand existing biome sensor networks

b82c8e7e-4b76-43f9-ad0a-47b35efbda93.name: Personal Electric Vehicles Mandate
b82c8e7e-4b76-43f9-ad0a-47b35efbda93.description: Start a major campaign to retrofit or trade-in personal ICE vehicles for EVs.

4234b0d3-11f1-47f7-ad3a-298605e6f8c0.name: Public Transit Mandate
4234b0d3-11f1-47f7-ad3a-298605e6f8c0.description: Start a major campaign to upgrade and expand existing public transit networks across major cities.

690c9265-6a7c-42bb-8235-1292fef69de0.name: Orbital Launch Improvements
690c9265-6a7c-42bb-8235-1292fef69de0.description: Launching payloads and people into space is a costly, intensive endeavor. If we want to work more in space we need to improve those technologies.
690c9265-6a7c-42bb-8235-1292fef69de0.effects: Prerequisite for other space technologies (for the space colonization path)

badb8b22-5222-45fc-b8f0-669b85d1361a.name: Nuclear Fusion
badb8b22-5222-45fc-b8f0-669b85d1361a.description: Put significant resources towards the development of nuclear fusion.
badb8b22-5222-45fc-b8f0-669b85d1361a.requirements: ?? what is the downside of doing this?
badb8b22-5222-45fc-b8f0-669b85d1361a.effects: Very unlikely to succeed, may just continue indefinitely

2e119e02-f764-4826-a31f-b6c583f0494c.name: Carbon-Negative Concrete
2e119e02-f764-4826-a31f-b6c583f0494c.effects: Unlocks a project to shift concrete production facilities to use the new technique

fe984268-6abc-4abc-92c2-cb1f9e60adb2.name: BECCS
fe984268-6abc-4abc-92c2-cb1f9e60adb2.description: Meet X% of energy demand with BECCS

777e6560-821e-494a-9370-c210f1dccbfd.name: Perennial Cereals
777e6560-821e-494a-9370-c210f1dccbfd.description: Perennial versions of the major cereal crops mean they don't need to be replanted each year, disturbing the soil less and sequestering more in deep roots
777e6560-821e-494a-9370-c210f1dccbfd.effects: improves carbon sequestration of agriculture locations

24fdf3b6-a461-4b16-9550-7e71b1d674c2.body: A category X hurricane is about to make landfall in LOCATION.
24fdf3b6-a461-4b16-9550-7e71b1d674c2.description:
- Location has poor hurricane infrastructure: The region is not equipped for a hurricane of this strength.
- Location has good hurricane infrastructure: Because of the area's efforts on hurricane preparedness, the residents are not too worried.
- Player has advanced forecasting systems?: Because of our weather sensor network, we were able to detect the hurricane farther in advance, so people have had more time to prepare.
24fdf3b6-a461-4b16-9550-7e71b1d674c2.locationConditions: Coastal regions, or regions that we flag as having hurricane risk?
24fdf3b6-a461-4b16-9550-7e71b1d674c2.conditions: More likely as global temperatures rise
24fdf3b6-a461-4b16-9550-7e71b1d674c2.effects:
- Location has poor hurricane infrastructure: lowered contentedness, energy disruption
- Location has good hurricane infrastructure/advanced forecasting system: some political capital gained
24fdf3b6-a461-4b16-9550-7e71b1d674c2.responses:
- Evacuate the area
    - If poor hurricane infrastructure and there was another recent major disaster nearby: Large amounts of people were unable to evacuate
    - Otherwise: minor loss to PC
- Leave them be: if poor hurricane infrastructure, major blow to political capital and contentedness

8e982a99-0247-4001-bcd5-d1db24169c54.body: The last X died in captivity. People around the world mourn the loss of a unique creature.
8e982a99-0247-4001-bcd5-d1db24169c54.description: - The X was a key part of the local culture... (lower contentedness)
8e982a99-0247-4001-bcd5-d1db24169c54.locationConditions:
Anywhere populated

NOTE: we should have a short list of species for each biome or region

d3de8316-8078-4adf-8642-384544e5d95f.body: The sudden decline of a keystone species in LOCATION has wreaked havoc on the local ecosystem.
d3de8316-8078-4adf-8642-384544e5d95f.effects: increases the risk level of negative events in that region
d3de8316-8078-4adf-8642-384544e5d95f.responses:
- That's a shame
- Mark the region as protected and begin rehabilitation: depending on where it is, this might have additional effects. Like if the region is a source of X resource, this might cause a supply squeeze for that down the road.

d5f15a58-11ee-4f92-afb0-64e74a360c9e.body: Large groups of X have been spotted--once an at-risk species, the populations have rebounded following more favorable conditions.
d5f15a58-11ee-4f92-afb0-64e74a360c9e.effects: increases contentedness, lowers risk level of that area

ea70d093-e31c-45e3-9210-db096f7816bf.body: A new virus is spreading rapidly in LOCATION

f5469f8a-d274-44ae-8beb-56eb1aa3fff4.body: A drought/lack of rainfall has caused widespread crop failures
f5469f8a-d274-44ae-8beb-56eb1aa3fff4.conditions: likelihood of occurring in a region depends on the precipitation for that area + general risk level
f5469f8a-d274-44ae-8beb-56eb1aa3fff4.responses:
- if surplus exists in other regions: move the surplus from other regions
- if no surplus in other regions: food is scarce, but move some from other regions
    - Lowers contentedness further
    - Possibility of hunger event next month
- There's nothing we can do
    - Lowers contentedness further
    - Possibility of major famine event next month

897d3997-7836-4a1b-ba2c-065f9f56cee9.body: Major flooding in X. Y are missing.
897d3997-7836-4a1b-ba2c-065f9f56cee9.description: - investment in climate preparedness has lessened the amount of damage.
897d3997-7836-4a1b-ba2c-065f9f56cee9.conditions: likelihood of occurring in a region depends on the precipitation for that area + general risk level

7b1ab92d-e7f6-4ea7-a41a-1ec470c19975.description:
- Generic, when generally low contentedness
- Specific: e.g. "The Meat Eaters" or "The Carnivore" movements against vegan mandates
